message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $20,000. I'm open to discussing further.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have a budget constraint. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly below its value.  I could be flexible, but not to that extent. Could you consider $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to be flexible, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $14,500?
